transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, sir ji namaskar sir.
Customer: Ji namaskar sir.
Executive: Sir ye mere India mart ka jo plan hai sir isme thoda sa problem ye aa rahi hai. To sir ye ab dobara se by lead ke liye payment mang raha hai sir ye.
Customer: Kis company se baat kar rahe company ka naam batayenge sir ek baar please mujhe.
Executive: Company ka naam hai sir Naruka steel industries.
Customer: Kaise?
Executive: Naruka steel industries.
Executive: Voice nahi aa rahi clear ek baar repeat karenge sir aap.
Customer: Naruka steel industry.
Executive: Ha aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya steel industry. Naruka Naruka. Ek minute sir line pe rahiyega main check kar leta hu maine aapko call back kiya tha sir thik hai.
Customer: Sir maine call back to kiya sir maine to pehle hi bataya tha mere dekhne ka time hi nahi hota. Ab ye bata raha hai ki by lead zero zero zero hai to fir isko use kyu karte karenge.
Executive: Ha zero hai ek minute aap line pe rahenge na to main check karke bata dunga kya issue aa raha hai. Kitni barish aapko milti hai kya issue aa raha hai kyuki abhi aapka seasonal hai thik hai sir seasonal abhi aapke paas inquiry kafi aa rahi hongi. Samne se calls inquiries ka rate aapka bada hoga ek month mein. Abhi aapka product maine update bhi kiya tha sir isko thoda sa lag raha tha mere ko to maine use dusre naam keyword se aapko dal diya tha. Sir aap rojana mein kitni lead dete ho aap ye bataye.
Customer: Ha sir?
Executive: Weekly kitni lead dete ho ya ya aap monthly ya yearly kitni lead dete ho hame ye to pata lage na.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul sir lekin weekly aap ek week mein jo aapko lead milti hai wo 17 leads milti hai per week thik hai daily ka aapko ek milti hai jo aapko 12 baje milti hai subah 12 am pe milti hai 11:59 pe khatam ho jati hai thik hai daily wali aapko daily use rojana rojana ki ek lead milti hai kya.
Executive: Ha rojana ki ek milti hai weekly ki aapko 10 milti hai.
Customer: Total 17 leads milti hai aapko thik hai.
Executive: Achcha 17 lead aapko milti hai. Chaliye iska matlab hai one week ki.
Customer: Ha one week ki one week ki aapko 17 lead to maine abhi tak use hi nahi ki. Ye band kaise ho gaya main to yahi puch raha hu na.
Executive: Kal aapne 25 tarikh ko 10 lead use kiya hai thik hai.
Customer: 25 tarikh ko 10 lead use ki hai.
Executive: Ha 25 ko aapne 10 lead use kiya hai. Aur do aaj aapne kiya hai. 25 tarikh ko aapne 10 lead kiya hai dobara ab ye dobara open kal hoga kya.
Customer: Dobara ek minute line pe rahiye main check kar leta hu ki abhi aapke paas balance bache honge. Ab is week ke to aapka khatam ho gaya thik hai ab jo aapko leads milegi thik hai sir use karne ke liye ab aapko next week milegi yaani aapko milegi man chaliye saturday ko yaani sunday ko aapko milegi thik hai sunday 12 baje bhi aapko mil jayegi wo. Aur subah usko aap use kar sakte hain usko fir sunday se.
Executive: Achcha ji kehne ka matlab rojana ki ek milegi aur sunday ko aapko 10 12 lead milegi.
Customer: Sunday ki nahi ek week yaani ek saptaah ko sunday ko milti hai saturday ko khatam ho jati hai thik hai jo milti hai wo 10 hoti hai aur daily ki aapko ek milti hai thik hai total 17 leads milti hai aapko.
Executive: Thik hai iska iska kehne ka matlab hai ki isme by lead jo hai badi soch samajh ke aap isko uthaye nahi to nahi uthaye. Kehne ka matlab aapka yahi hai.
Customer: Bilkul nahi nahi ji agar jaise jo daily milti hai agar usko aapne use kar liya sahi hai wo thik hai agar nahi use karenge to daily wali daily khatam ho jati hai thik hai.
Executive: Wo to aapki baat man li main ye keh raha hu achcha daily ki jo hai wo to rojana ki rojana khatam ho jati hai wo jo last ka jaise man lo saturday aa gaya to usme ek sath 10 lead aa jati hai kya.
Customer: Ha ek jaise sunday ko aapko milti hai 10 lead thik hai sunday ko jo milengi aapko 10 milengi wo saturday ko aapko khatam hongi thik hai sunday ko milengi saturday ko aapko khatam ho jayegi 10 lead.
Executive: Achcha thik hai aur daily aapko ek milti rahengi ab jo jo aapko weekly milti hai na usko aap kabhi bhi use kar sakte ho lekin daily wala jo hota hai ek lead ji bataye kehne ka matlab ye hai kehne ka matlab aapka yahi hai ki wo is lead ke andar jo aapko aapke jo related hai aapki company se wahi aap uske option pe aapne button dabana hai baki kisi pe button mat dabaiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi ha jis product line mein aap deal kar rahe ho ha nahi jis product line mein aap deal karte hain usi product line ki leads aapko consume karni hai thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik thik hai sir thik thik hai baki unko mat chhediye ha ji ha bilkul bilkul sir ha bilkul unko jisme aap deal bhi nahi karte usko aap dekhna hi nahi hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai sir thik hai. Ek cheez mere ko ye bataye sir jaise 25 tarikh ko aapne 10 leads consume kiya hai thik hai to unko aapne call bhi kiya tha.
Executive: Ho sakta hai kiya hoga.
Customer: Message kiye message kiye na whatsapp whatsapp message kiye unko sabhi ko.
Executive: Nahi nahi whatsapp message kya hota hai dekhiye whatsapp message se kya hota hai ki client jaise maine aapko message kiya thik hai sir aap free ho ya nahi free ho to aap reply de dete hain thik hai but agar samne se aap 10 logo ko call karenge na sir to unse aapki baat hogi kya aapne inquiry ki thi sir kya aapki services hai kya aapko requirement hai to wo samne se jarur batayenge is cheez ke liye sir.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji ha ji ha ji.
Executive: Jaise abhi kya hai sir aapka season chalne wala hai thik hai sir ye aapka man chaliye february march tak chalega abhi jaise thik hai thandi ka season hai.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji ha ji.
Executive: To aapka seasonal rahega main service agar aap karenge thik hai sir jaise aaj mein aapko lead aur jyada chahiye abhi thik hai.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Jaise abhi jo leads milti hai aapko 17 milti hai thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: To abhi main keh raha hu sir ek mara just thik hai trust seal agar aap lete hain to online jo buyer aate hain aapko thik hai usme aapka trust ka issue nahi banega thik hai trust seal ka aapko logo certificate milega usme aapko jo weekly abhi 17 22 mil rahi hai na sir to weekly aapko waha pe 34 yaani 34 22 aapko milna shuru ho jayenge sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thik hai ha usme aapko jab 34 22 milenge na sir to conversion ratio jo hoga aapke business ka wo aur jyada badhta chala jayega sir dheere dheere.
Executive: Ha nahi kehne ka matlab yahi hai lead to wahi rehni hai lekin jo 17 to aani hai 17 wo jo leade aani hai jo mere layak nahi hai lead aa gayi wo to consume ho gayi nahi matlab aapne to bhej diya aapne to aapne jo aapne jo lead bheji hai na wo to aapne bhej hi di wo kehne ka matlab hai ki be matlab ki lead bhi to aati hai na jiski mujhe avashyakta hi nahi wo lead aayi hai ab main use consume karu to sham ko nash ho hi jayegi.
Customer: Ji jiski aapko avashyakta hai wo to sham ko nash ho hi jayegi na.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapke matlab ki pure din mein aayegi a se 10 lead aayegi aisa nahi aisa nahi aisa nahi hota mere to do dino baad mein koi ek aadhi aati hai to hafte ke baad mein main usko tick karta hu nahi to padi hai jaise padi hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir aap kahiye to main aapko daily basis pe lead deta hu sir thik hai kyuki beech mein aapne mera phone khana band kar diya tha na aap bata rahe the kahi busy hai isliye main call kar raha tha are sir busy busy rehte hain ab to main aaj to main free tha maine kaha chalo isko dekhte hain kal bhi main thoda sa gadi mein baitha baitha maine kaha chalo isko dekhte hain khol ke kya kya aaya hai to ek do order uska confirm kiye humne usko dale message ke sir bataye jaisa bhi hai aur aaj bhi main yahi main kaha chalo itne din nahi maine isko khola main kaha aaj khol ke dekhte hain aaj khol ke dekha to ye kehta hai ye ek lead ke aap isko khologe na to aapke 350 alag se aur lagenge main kaha yaar khaya piya kuch nahi nuksan ho gaya wo alag to wahi baat ho gayi main khaya piya kuch nahi nuksan ho gaya alag ha nahi aap party mat kijiye koi bhi kyuki dekhiye ek lead ki jo cost aati hai 395 400 aati hai thik hai per lead ki cost wo wo wo hi to bata wahi to main dekh raha hu na main kaha sir maine itne din se to kuch khaya nahi piya nahi main kaha aaj beta main kaha aaj kal aur aaj main dekha to wo lead thi kal jo maine wo kehte hai be matlab ki jo lead thi un pe button daba diya to wo lead lapse ho gayi aur aaj jo honi thi wo bhi lapse ho gayi chalo bhavishya mein thoda sa ye wo kahenge ki jo lead hai usko puri jaan padtal karke hi uthaye ha waha pe leads aap dekhenge jis aapka product waha pe chapa hoga aapka product ki image hogi client ka right side mein kya hota hai sir ki usne kitni bar reply kiya hai thik hai us jaise usko aap dekhenge aapke client ka uska mobile number uski mail id company ka naam uska whatsapp number char panch cheeze waha pe client ka di rehti hai thik hai leads jaise aap consume karoge fir unko aap call karoge na sir samne se to khud hi response karenge wo koi baat nahi aise karenge sir to ye cheeze aapko suggest kar deta hu thik hai sir to trust seal ka jo main aapko bata raha tha sir hello hmm hmm hmm main yehi sir main keh raha tha sir main aapko thik hai ek trust seal ka aapko hello ha ji ha ji boliye sir main keh raha tha aapko thik hai sir ek hello ha ji main keh raha tha sir aapko ek trust seal ka main aapko jo bata raha tha isme aapko kyuki abhi jo aapka seasonal dhana chalega thik hai sir seasonal ke sath sath online business ke aapko kya hoga agar aapko jyada inquiries aa rahe hain thik hai leads isme aapko jyada milenge to main keh raha hu sir just aap ye thoda sa package agar aap badha lenge na sir to aapko leads abhi 17 jo mil rahe hain wo 34 milna shuru ho jayenge thik hai sir sir 34 main to yahi baat keh raha hu sir 34 mein mere jo layak hai na 17 mein se do lead ya teen lead hi mere liye layak hai baki jo uske andar 12 lead jo hai na wo be fijul ki lead aa rahi hai ab unko dekhne ke chakkar mein button hath se dab jata hai wo ho jata hai kyuki jo jo hamara product hai usse related agar photo aati hai to hum use consume karte hain uske alava koi photo aati hai hum usko bhi button daba dete hain to bhai lead jo hai wo zero ho gayi na nahi nahi yahi to problem pad raha hai na aap keh rahe ho 34 aa rahi hai main keh raha hu 34 ki jagah agar 10 bhi agar mere aa jaye na to hi bahut hai 34 wo 17 ab aap keh rahe ho hafte ki 17 17 mein se aap check kijiye ki maine itne dino mein sirf 25 tarikh ko hi khola hai aur 25 ek se leke 25 dino mein maine 10 consume ki to mujhe usme kya benefit hua yaha pe ye hona chahiye na 17 man lo kehne ka matlab hai 50 jo lead hai na hamesha reserve rehni chahiye matlab aap kabhi bhi man lo isko use kar sakte ho ab use wo baat hui ha chalo thik hai sir koi baat nahi aap samajh main samajh gaya aapki baat wo main to aapki baat sari samajh gaya ki wahi lead use karni hai jo aapki avashyakta hai baki isko button dabao hi mat jo aapki product hai wahi leads aap consume kijiye sir bas bas bas bas bas itna hi tha aur chalo ha thik hai thik hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about lead distribution.

- Payment being asked again for buyleads.

- Leads are not relevant to his business.



Resolution:

- Explained weekly and daily lead distribution.

- Explained about TrustSeal benefits.

- Suggested to consume leads of relevant product line.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, trustseal, lead distribution
